channel.title: Item on Item effects. [RESOLVED]
channel.description: Where can I set what happens if you use an item on another item. I want to make it so that you have to use a hilt on a godsword blade to make a godsword.

item.title: Item on Item effects. [RESOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

That’s reward enough, i love helping people out. Besides rep is just a number, a dumb person could have 500 rep just for being popular. Even though i only have 12 rep i’m not one of those people who say, “how do i add an object” lol. So rep means nothing.

item.title: Item on Item effects. [RESOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

go back with the original one, the useitem and usewith or whatever, but just put it under this case, and be sure to put a break at the end.

[code] case 53: // Use Item on another Item
/junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int usedWithSlot = inStream.readSignedWord();
int itemUsedSlot = (int)(misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 1, 1) / 1000);
int useWith = playerItems[usedWithSlot];/
int p4 = 0;
//int itemUsed = playerItems[itemUsedSlot];
int p6 = 0;

                                    int usedWithSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
				int itemUsedSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
                                    //int useWith = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
                                    int interface1284 = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
				//int itemUsed = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
				int interfacek = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
                                    //usedWithSlot += 1;
                                    //itemUsedSlot += 1;
                                    int useWith = playerItems[usedWithSlot]-1;
                                    int itemUsed = playerItems[itemUsedSlot]-1;[/code]

item.title: Item on Item effects. [RESOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

if((itemUsed == hilt && useWith == blade) { deleteItem(hilt, getItemSlot(hiltid), 1); deleteItem(blade, getItemSlot(blade), 1); addItem(godsword, 1); sendMessage("Whatever...."); }Replace “hilt” with the id of the hilt and “blade” with the id of the blade. Then change godsword into the id of the godsword.
